extendedInfo.description: The Planet has been INVADED! The Worldâs Military enslaved by an Alien Mind Control Device! Only ONE Battle Squad remains.Shielded in their underground bunkers, our heroes emerge into a Fight for Survival. The Invaders must be stopped at all costs!âââ Command armies of - Tanks- Infantry- Helicopters- Trikes- Deploy Turrets- Explosive Barrels- Landmines - And many more to defeat the enemy!Using the unique strengths of each unit, combine battlefield tactics and decisive action to outsmart and conquer the invaders!Lightweight fast units for carrying out lightning raids, slow powerful siege tanks for bombarding enemy positions, battle tanks and infantry squads for intense warfare: choose the right units for the job and command them in battle. âââ Thereâs a huge variety of missions in the first Defense Command mission pack and with many more mission packs in development, the replay value of this game is going to be massive!Each mission is designed to bring you the best gameplay experience from playing Defense Command and will challenge you to combine strategy and action in different ways.Play a fast 2 minute mission or take on the entire might of the enemy onslaught and take back the Planet!âââ Play for free!Download Defense Command now and if you like what you see, our constantly evolving series of mission packs will keep you hooked. Mission pack 1 âBattlefield Troopersâ is available at the Google Store!

reviews.title: RAAHHHH
reviews.comment: We at least need a few skirmish maps... levels aren\'t really playable from the few,resources we have
reviews.author: Nathan Molloy

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun game but there are only a handful of games to play before u run out. Would be a lot better if they offered more levels.
reviews.author: Hector Montoya

reviews.title: sucks
reviews.comment: This game is way to easy i beat it in about 30-40 mins then tells me i have to buy full version for the rest of the mission srry but i dnt pay to have fun and neither should you uninstall
reviews.author: Mike Tetreault

reviews.title: Lots of potential but amazing as is
reviews.comment: The command and conquer feel is definitely there. Graphics are acceptable at today\'s par. No complaints there. I bought the full version after finishing the first campaign so yes there is a lot to this game. BUT, please expand the maps to more than a single screen view. I know you\'re doing the best you can with the touchscreen limitation but come on, in the next campaign I better see maps that require exploring. Oh, and shadow the unexplored parts. PLUS, give us an option to \"re-buy\" last  item purchased. I hate always going back to the bottom menu just to place another mine.  Other than that, GREAT JOB and keep em coming!!
reviews.author: Tomas Kunder

reviews.title: Excellent BUT...
reviews.comment: CAMPAIGN  1) The game doesn\'t resume my progress if I receive call or minimize the game window during active gameplay  2) Mission  6 \'Rescue Prisoners\' cannot be completed.
reviews.author: Manish Mayekar

reviews.title: Slow, boring and non responsive
reviews.comment: Building to many buildings causes lag in the game which will eventually crash it losing you all you progress. Not worth the money in my opinion.
reviews.author: Mark Owen

reviews.title: Not exactly the best
reviews.comment: It\'s a playable game but there are some SERIOUS balance issues, at least in campaign, that need seeing to. For example 2 riflemen shouldn\'t have a chance against 1 medium to heavy vehicle yet they kill them quite easily. Also vehicles cannot run over infantry, something else that I would suggest fixing. Other than that I like it so far.
reviews.author: Neo Masaki

reviews.title: Moderate Replay Value
reviews.comment: Most everything here is spot-on. The units are creative, and the C&C feel keeps me glued... for a while. Unfortunately, the missions are only good for one or two playthroughs. Skirmish would keep me opening this and giving financial support if the cheating AI didn\'t start with half a map of units and defenses. Just give them a moderate base and the ability to expand, and this game will be near perfect.
reviews.author: Spencer Pearce

reviews.title: too bad
reviews.comment: slow, choppy, would be cool if it gets fixed
reviews.author: Matthew Grove

reviews.title: Me
reviews.comment: This was cool until I found that you have to BUY THE LEVELS that are actually good allit needs a survival mode that gave more money the more wave js you pass also gives more levels come on
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice perhaps perfect
reviews.comment: Can you make the full version free so I can get the full experience please
reviews.author: Marcell Wallace

reviews.title: Not quite Command & Conquer.
reviews.comment: I was hoping for more options and upgrades in the skirmish mode after paying $3. It is the same game every time. You can\'t upgrade any units or buildings. You are also limited on the buildings. No research center or anything like that. Very close to the first C&C, but i was hoping for more of red alert or tiberium wars.  Worth the download for free, skip the paid version until they add more content.
reviews.author: Nick Hale

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Just makes u wanna play a better game
reviews.author: Chad S.

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Works well enough for a tablet and gameplay is good although I cant imagine it being viewable on a phone screen,  playing. On a tablet and tnats tricky
reviews.author: Adam Hooper

reviews.title: Hate
reviews.comment: I hate it
reviews.author: Hakeem Barzey

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: I paid for the full version and  have not been able to complete a single game.  What a waste of money.  Do not pay for the full version, the game always crashes in the middle of a skirmish and you have to start over.
reviews.author: Mike Wilbur

reviews.title: BS game
reviews.comment: You basically get to play a tutorial and thats it.  After that you have to pay to play, which is sad because it has potential to be a great game but falls short when you have to pay $2.99 to keep playing.
reviews.author: Tyler Cleveland

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: BTW, I beat \"rescue prisoners\": just build some oil trucks, wait till they make some money ($1000 per load of oil), then build a war factory and a crapload of tanks
reviews.author: Skylar Dunn

reviews.title: Super game
reviews.comment: I am love to play this game good commading game
reviews.author: Ananthu MA

reviews.title: Eh..
reviews.comment: I found that if you back up your tank or whatever and then attack quick it shoots instantly. Glitch? Also can\'t beat mission 5 because it wont end...
reviews.author: colin baltz
